attributes.action: Allow attachment of earnings to be made to contractors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently a loophole exists in the law to allow contract workers to never have an attachment of earnings court order placed on their wages. Thus allowing them to never pay off debt to local authorities, utility companies and landlords etc. Contactors should not be allowed to evade paying debts off this way, attachments should be allowed to be made onto their earnings just like employed workers.
